com.simpleecm.imageprocessing.operation

Class SECMImageExportOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simpleecm.imageprocessing.operation.SECMImageExportOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SECMImageExportOperation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    SECMImageExportOperation helps to export bitmaps to image or PDF file(s) without blocking the UI thread. This class allows to perform the exporting task as a background operation without manipulate threads and/or handlers.
    Author:
    César Ynga

        Export the given bitmaps to image files
        Parameters:
        directoryName - the directory name where the image file will be saved
        bitmaps - list of bitmaps to export
        fileNames - list of names for the image to export
